revised_title: An Analysis of Ophiothrix fragilis Development and Fertilization Techniques
tldr: The author investigates the development and fertilization techniques of Ophiothrix fragilis, a common species of British Ophiuroidea. Two types of development are observed, with differences in segmentation, blastula formation, and mesenchyme production. The author also discusses the importance of egg condition at the moment of fertilization and its influence on subsequent development.
